title: PM to address SCO Summit shortly: Marriyum
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 16 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Marriyum Aurangzeb announced Friday that Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif will address the SCO Summit shortly.
In a tweet, she said PTV will broadcast his address.
PM Shehbaz Sharif will address the SCO-CHS shortly.PTV will broadcast.#PakPMatSCO #SCOSummit2022
â€” Marriyum Aurangzeb (@Marriyum_A) September 16, 2022
